Hringrás

Hringrás was a collaborative show between 15 Icelandic graphic designers and illustrators, held at Kaffi Mokka in Reykjavík on DesignMarch 2013 and at TastySpace, Las Vegas in April 2013. The theme of the show was hringrás (meaning cycle in English). Each designer or illustrator interpreted one artwork based on the theme.

My piece for the show is called End Stage. It illustrates the end stage of cell division but also the dawn of a new robot age.

Initiation, planning and curation done in collaboration with Jónas Valtýsson, Erla María Árnadóttir, Alli Metall and Halldór Andri Bjarnason.

Website and marketing material done in collaboration with Alli Metall.

www.hringras.in
